taxPPro

Source: vignettes/taxPPro.Rmd
taxPPro.Rmd

Packages 

library(taxPPro)
library(data.tree)

Load NCBI tree 

data('tree_list')
ncbi_Tree <- as.Node(tree_list)

Load living tree project tree and tip and node data: 

ltp <- ltp()
